answers.answer: aww good luck for induction... So are they expecting her to be a little or big baby?Dont be scared as you'll have your little princess in your arms soon :)

YAY!! We so need a March mommy! LOL I am hoping to be induced next week as well. I see my Ob on Monday and hopefully we can set something up for the 12th! Had a u/s today and Logan is 6lbs 2oz! Good Luck, keep us posted!

She is supposedly tiny but my mw says she will eat her hat if this baby is smaller than 6 pounds lol...It just ***** not knowing when it is going to happen...I said to my partner it would be nice if they booked me in for Tuesday morning and I had the whole thing over and done with by the time my boys finished daycare lol 6lbs 2oz is a nice size :) Let me know if you will be getting induced then too...Fingers crossed for all of us :)

Good luck next week Crystalrt and mamaofonetrying42 ...  I am being induced this week on the 12th, I am so anxious/nervous/excited! I can't wait to see my toes! Oh wait, I can't wait to put my own socks on without hollaring for my husband to do so! LOL I have gained 50 pounds and waddle like a penguin! Luckly it's all belly and boobs! My belly is holding lots of amniotic fluid, so I have so much pressure under my ribs causing me not to be able to BREATH! They said he is also laying on my main artery in my back restricting blood flow. I would think that was enough to go ahead with my C-Section but they said its normal! Are you all having that problem! I had to go to the hospital yesturday because I was so out of breath I was seeing black spots. I was hoping they would go ahead and take him but they wouldnt! They said I am dilated a good 1 and 80% thinned out. When she checked me, she actually touched the babys head and he floated away! She said he has so much fluid theres no telling what postion he will be in this coming friday. Keep me updated girls and GOOD LUCK!

We are setup to be induced next week Wed. the 17th, if everything goes as planned, or if Mr. Logan doesnt come on his own! Was really hoping for sometime this week but OH well....At least I know I only have a week togo! And He will be a St. pattys day baby!
wait, why are you getting induced next week? you'd be 39 then right? I'm 37w6d so almost like you, so  I was wondering why would the doc try to induce you

I have pregnancy induce hypertension. I see an High risk dr. and he doesnt want me to go pass 39w due to the increase chance of the Hypertension getting worst. It started with my 1st son and I had to be induced at 37w6d because my blood pressure had got in so high(with other prob's) This time around we were going to hold off on the induction but at my last visit there has been some prob's, its just best for the baby! I am hoping that MAYBE I'll go this weekend on my own....Fingers Crossed!

Oh wow! crossing my fingers for you! My mom had preeclampsia and somehow she had me at 41 weeks, by c section but only because her pelvis was little. Ive been so nervous this whole pregnancy fearing that I wouldn't have any blood pressure problem either, and till now nothing, thank god. I'm going to be 38w tomorrow so hopefully the little one will come, in both of our cases, without having to be induced!

question: I just went to my regular check up yesterday and got the results from my ultrasound from Tuesday...Leilani is on the 10th percentile for overall growth and on the 9th for abdominal circumference so they said I will be seeing a doctor Monday to get booked in to be induced...Kinda getting scared now lol...At least I don't have to wait until my due date :) Soon we will all have our babies...Will keep you posted on when I will be having her...
title: Getting Induced Next Week!
